metadata.title: CVE-2023-31082 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in drivers/tty/n_gsm.c in the Linuxkernel 6.2. There is a sleeping function called from an invalid context ingsmld_write, which will block the kernel. Note: This has been disputed by3rd parties as not a valid vulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
